channel.title: Building Bridges With Those You Love: Classic Sinai Podcast

channel.itunes:author: Rabbi Noach Orlowek

item.title: Building Bridges With Those You Love
item.description: Giving and receiving love - this class contains many practical ways of achieving this goal that movies and pop songs never quite get around to explaining.
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Noach Orlowek
